alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Carroll; Putnam; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 10:57AM CDT until April 04 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PUTNAM...EASTERN WHITESIDE...SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL AND BUREAU COUNTIES... At 1056 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Walnut, or 14 miles north of Princeton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Ohio and Kasbeer around 1105 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Van Orin and La Moille. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
